sdapy.models.villar.villar¶

sdapy.models.villar.villar(time, a, b, t0, t1, tfall, trise, c)¶

Villar et al 2019 (https://iopscience.iop.org/article/10.3847/1538-4357/ab418c/pdf), function 1

Parameters
timearray

Independent values.

afloat

A, Amplitude

bfloat

beta (flux/day), Plateau slope

t0float

“Start” time

t1float

plateau onset of LC

tfall: float

rise time of LC

trise: float

fall time of LC

cfloat

baseline flux

HAFFET
